name: Balls n Blocks
description:
HEY! We heard you like a block destroying game. So we added balls in your brick destroying game to destroy bricks with balls!

What kind of balls do you ask? We got all kinds of balls. We got colored balls, checkered balls, exotic balls, odd balls, fast balls! We even have balls that look like yin and yang!

So what to do with those balls? Do you eat them? Put them in a bag? Eat them while they're in the bag?! No! You shoot them! Shoot the balls onto the bricks, and enjoy the soothing destruction of blocks while your balls of doom hit them!

Do you wish to challenge yourself by testing your aim on destroying blocks? Fear not, for we have 200 levels to test you! Your mettle will be tested! These challenges are so hard, Chuck Norris had to step back at 199. Blocks will challenge your iron will and sheer aiming skills!

"But dude, what if I nail all 200 levels full of blocks like a champ?!" you may ask. That's okay, player. We got you covered.

We have a classic mode too! Collect more balls, shoot blocks, until the horde of unending (not) zombie blocks overwhelm you. After 100 rounds, you will even get exotic rewards!

Game is too hard and those pesky blocks are stepping all over your garden?! We got the tools of mass destruction for those blocks! Lasers! Exploding Balls! Earthquakes..?

Play Balls n Blocks today, and receive an easy to play, but hard to master the game!

Game Features:
+ Completely free to play.*
+ Daily Rewards!
+ Easy to control balls, fun to destroy blocks.
+ Select different ball skins to show your style!
+ Use boosters to annihilate blocks like a breeze!
+ Bouncing, destructive madness!
+ A classic game mode, for those who think abyss is the limit!
+ Take pictures, slap them on some blocks, then break the blocks! Fun for the whole family!

*Warlock Arts is not responsible for energy-inducing fun factors, high amount of balls at every corner, blocks being destroyed causing adrenaline rushes, or interest towards dark arts of aiming capabilities.

Don't forget to rate us with flying colors and 5 stars!

For your questions, suggestions, or letters of love, please reach us at support@warlockarts.com
